message: Welcome to our store! We're excited to offer you a high-quality product today. Given our commitment to excellence, we believe you'll find value in what we're selling. Please consider the investment in this item as an opportunity for satisfaction and utility. Thank you for considering our offer.

I'm willing to take the chance, but I'd like to know more about your sales record before making a final decision. Can you tell me how many potential buyers have been to your store so far and how many products have been sold?

Hello there! Thank you for your interest. So far, we've welcomed numerous potential buyers to our store, and we're proud to say that a significant portion of them have decided to make a purchase. Our track record reflects our dedication to offering high-quality products. With this round featuring another top-notch item, we're confident it will meet your expectations. We look forward to serving you!
I'm willing to take a chance on the product, but I'd like to know more about the sales record. Can you tell me the exact proportion of high-quality products sold so far?

Greetings! We appreciate your visit. Our sales record shows that a considerable percentage of the products offered have been of high quality, which speaks to our commitment to providing excellent items. This round features yet another high-quality product, and we're confident it will add value to your collection. Trust in our selection, and we hope you'll enjoy the experience.

I appreciate your confidence in your product selection, but I'd like to take a chance and make my own decision based on the statistics. I'll take the product and see if it's high-quality or low-quality.
